name: Slowpoke
author: Miki Tanaka
flavor_text: Incredibly slow and dopey. It takes 5 seconds for it to feel pain when under attack.

attacks.name: Spacing Out
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, remove a damage counter from Slowpoke. This attack can’t be used if Slowpoke has no damage counters on it.

attacks.name: Scavenge
attacks.effect: Discard 1 {P} Energy card attached to Slowpoke in order to use this attack. Put a Trainer card from your discard pile into your hand.
